00040 #ifndef _CameraManager_cpp
00041 #define _CameraManager_cpp
00042 
00043 #include "cameramanager.h"
00044 #include "scenemanager.h"
00045 #include "graphicsmanager.h"
00046 #include "camera.h"
00047 #include "world.h"
00048 
00049 #include <Ogre.h>
00050 
00051 #include <vector>
00052 #include <sstream>
00053 
00054 namespace phys
00055 {
00056     CameraManager::CameraManager(Whole SceneManagerIndex)
00057     {
00058         this->SManager = GameWorld->GetSceneManager(SceneManagerIndex);
00059         this->DefaultCamera = NULL;
00060         this->Priority = -20;
00061         this->CreateDefaultCamera();
00062     }
00063 
00064     CameraManager::~CameraManager()
00065     {
00066         if(NULL!=DefaultCamera)
00067         {
00068             delete DefaultCamera;
00069         }
00070         Camera* tempcam = NULL;
00071         if(!(Cameras.empty()))
00072         {
00073             for( std::vector<Camera*>::iterator it = Cameras.begin() ; it != Cameras.end() ; it++ )
00074             {
00075                 tempcam = (*it);
00076                 delete tempcam;
00077                 Cameras.erase(it);
00078             }
00079         }
00080     }
00081 
00082     Camera* CameraManager::FindCamera(String Name)
00083     {
00084         for( std::vector<Camera*>::iterator c=Cameras.begin(); c!=Cameras.end(); c++ )
00085         {
00086             if ( Name == (*c)->GetName() )
00087             {
00088                 return *c;
00089             }
00090         }
00091         return NULL;
00092     }
00093 
00094     Camera* CameraManager::CreateDefaultCamera()
00095     {
00096         if(NULL!=DefaultCamera)
00097         {
00098             delete DefaultCamera;
00099             DefaultCamera = NULL;
00100         }
00101         String Name="DefaultCamera";
00102         Ogre::Camera* OgreCam = this->SManager->GetGraphicsWorldPointer()->createCamera(Name);
00103         this->DefaultCamera = new Camera(OgreCam, this);
00104         return DefaultCamera;
00105     }
00106 
00107     Camera* CameraManager::GetDefaultCamera()
00108     {
00109         return DefaultCamera;
00110     }
00111 
00112     Camera* CameraManager::CreateCamera(const String& Name)
00113     {
00114         Ogre::Camera* OgreCam = this->SManager->GetGraphicsWorldPointer()->createCamera(Name);
00115         Camera* tempcam = new Camera(OgreCam, this);
00116         Cameras.push_back(tempcam);
00117         return tempcam;
00118     }
00119 
00120     Camera* CameraManager::GetCamera(const String& Name)
00121     {
00122         Camera* tempcam = FindCamera(Name);
00123         return tempcam;
00124     }
00125 
00126     Camera* CameraManager::GetCamera(Whole Index)
00127     {
00128         return Cameras[Index];
00129     }
00130 
00131     Whole CameraManager::GetNumCameras()
00132     {
00133         return Cameras.size();
00134     }
00135 
00136     void CameraManager::ClearCameras()
00137     {
00138         Camera* camera = NULL;
00139         for( std::vector< Camera* >::iterator it = Cameras.begin() ; it != Cameras.end() ; it++ )
00140         {
00141             camera = (*it);
00142             delete camera;
00143             Cameras.erase(it);
00144         }
00145         return;
00146     }
00147 
00148     void CameraManager::CreateViewport(const String& Name, Camera* ViewportCam)
00149     {
00150         Viewports[Name] = GameWorld->GetGraphicsManager()->GetOgreWindowPointer()->addViewport(ViewportCam->Cam, Viewports.size());
00151     }
00152 
00153     // Inherited from ManagerBase
00154     void CameraManager::Initialize()
00155         {}
00156 
00157     void CameraManager::DoMainLoopItems()
00158         {}
00159 
00160     ManagerBase::ManagerTypeName CameraManager::GetType() const
00161         { return ManagerBase::CameraManager; }
00162 
00163     Ogre::Viewport* CameraManager::GetOgreViewport(const String& Name)
00164     {
00165         return Viewports[Name];
00166     }

00168 }//phys
